ygData.subject: Re: level 12 necro.. about time!
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, to answer a few questions at a time: 1) RTS is Runed Totem Staff, you will need a magical weapon if you want to melee against most creatures 2) There is
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, to answer a few questions at a time:

1) RTS is Runed Totem Staff, you will need a magical weapon if you want to
melee against most creatures

2) There is a ghoul camp, but I'm not sure where yet... see #1 because they
are only hit with magical attacks

3) Go to East commons, to Nektulos forest. At the way other side of the
zone, almost straight north, the entrance to Lavastorm resides.


-----Original Message-----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 7:10 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] level 12 necro.. about time!


>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
>Are there a lot of undead in Lavastorm???
>
>

>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] level 12 necro.. about time!

>> >From: "Alex" <potat@...>
>> >
>> >I would definately go to Lavastorm, and you can stay there for the next
4
>> >levels, at least. The experience is great, the loot is wonderful, there
>> are
>> >words to be found here, and it is grossly underpopulated. Just make
sure
>> >you either have a summoned dagger for your skeleton or it is level 12,
>> since
>> >there are many magical creatures here. It also helps to have a RTS with
>> >vampiric embrace.
>> >
